What, as per you, is the role of developing and emerging countries in reviving the current global economic conditions?

Aa we all know India is a developing country and also we know the situation of Economic growth in our country.The growth of India is mostly due to Agriculture,Coal,Petroleum etc.So, only due to the development of these fields we can not acheive more growth,it is necessary to take the help of other developing countries as we are currently doing it like the business with the other countries to improve the economic conditions globally.It is very necessary and important to maintain dealings,good relationships,strong rappo with our neighbouring countries or the developing countries for ex: import n export of forein goods and our goods expecially in the business of electronic products,automobiles like mobiles,watches,cosmetics other electronic goods with the main countiries like china,USA,Japan,Singapore etc....So,at last i want to conclude that by continuing the businesses and also by maintaining good relationships with the neighbouring or developing countries it will be helpfull and it plays a very important role in reviving the current economic conditions.
